gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: NASA Langley Research Center, Atmospheric Sciences Division, Aerosol Research Branch

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: A monthly data file coincident with solar event granules, that provides information about cloud presence during data capture of the granules Version Description: Created for the second SAGE III reprocessing campaign

gmd:purpose.gco:CharacterString: For the studies of atmospheric science, global warming and radiative balance
